law.text: Each board of education may make arrangements with the persons in charge of the moral instruction as the board deems necessary and advisable.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 209, effective July 13, 1990. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4363-7d.
